entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove default Response (200) on methods POST, PUT and DELETE #43330
  • Code cleanup: Removing a superfluous switch block in Kestrel/Core #43328
  • No service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.RoleManager registered NET 6 #43327
  • Assembly loading failed #43326
  • Blazor - Still cannot specify generic type constraints for Components #43325
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #43322
  • CorsPolicyBuilder does not correctly combine policy with DefaultIsOriginAllowed #43319
  • Customise blazor-error-ui at runtime #43318
  • Blazor Wasm MSAL authentication stuck on loggin in when msal.js returns "Operation Completed" #43317
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22413.1] Setting the header Content-Length is not allowed on responses with status code 204 Error in ASP.NET Core apps #43316
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext #43314
  • JwtBearerEvents might be null, despite being marked as not null #43313

Closed

  • Improve code using pattern matching #43277
    8.0-alpha1
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • HTTP/2: Consider increasing default window sizes #41825
    7.0-rc1
  • Unable to connect to the SPA development server at 'https://localhost:44490'. / Visual Studio 2022 - ASP.NET Core Angular #43243
  • Perf improvement: https #43305
  • [API] Add client result support to Java client #41777
    7.0-rc1

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SocketTransportOptions doc comment reference #43332
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Don't run publish-specific Mvc.Testing tasks if project is not publishable #43329
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Increase Kestrel's default HTTP/2 upload window sizes #43324
    area-runtime, ask-mode, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix resolving method declaration in separate file #43323
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Don't throw TaskCanceledException in RateLimitingMiddleware #43320
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Improve code using pattern matching #43285
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1
  • [release/7.0] Fix missing using in Http3TimeoutTests #43321
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 7.0-rc2
  • Update branding to 8.0.0-alpha1 #43307
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-alpha1
  • Increase Kestrel's default HTTP/2 upload window sizes #43302
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Fix missing using in Http3TimeoutTests #43312
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 7.0-rc1
  • Sync shared code from runtime #43315
    area-runtime, 7.0-rc1
  • Fix missing using in Http3TimeoutTests #43311
    area-runtime, 8.0-alpha1
  • Follow-ups to 'Fix MVC form data binding localization' (#43182) #43309
    area-mvc, 8.0-alpha1
  • Update Major Version/TFM doc #43308
    8.0-alpha1
  • Add SignalR client results to Java client #41774
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java, 7.0-rc1

Updated

  • Exclusively use Azure (public) feeds #43303
    area-infrastructure
  • Better support for HTTP/2 in SignalR .NET client #42817
    blocked, area-signalr, signalr-client-net
  • Update branding to 7.0.0-rc2 #43240
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0-rc2
  • Only create context if an event is set #43211
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Update SDK #43028
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add LF request line terminator option #43202
    area-runtime
  • Add support for running final conventions during build #43225
    area-web-frameworks
  • [blazor][wasm] load .js and .wasm assets by runtime #43049
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 7.0-rc1
  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • Expose entire EndpointBuilder to filter factories #43255
  • Perf-up the AuthZ! #43268
    community-contribution
  • [SignalR] [JS Client] Retry HTTP request on auth failure #43300
    area-signalr, signalr-client-javascript
  • Cancel client results after a default timeout (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr
